name: 9Bubbles - Brain Games
description:
This game will make you smarter and relieve your stress.
It is easy at the beginning, but gets more and more difficult.
Theoretically, only 1 player per 10,000 can beat all the stages. Let's try!

Rules are very simple.
Memorize the "colors" and "positions" of bubbles which are displayed for only 3 seconds.
After they disappear, use your memory, select bubbles and burst them.

Continue playing this game and you will see that your power of memory improves.

The game does more than just improve your memory.
Seeing colors is mainly handled by the right side of your brain which is said to control your creativity and intuition. Just by playing this game, you will be able to improve your creative ability.

The game has 28 stages in total. If you beat all the stages, the right side of your brain will be able to handle more information than ever!

There are many games which train the left side of the brain including Sudoku and other number puzzles, but there are not many games in the world which train the right side of the brain.

Play this game, train the right side of your brain and make your everyday life full of creativity!
